name: d3fc-extent
description: Extends the d3 extent functionality to allow multiple accessors, padding and date support

scripts.bundle: rimraf build && rollup -c && uglifyjs build/d3fc-extent.js --compress --mangle -o build/d3fc-extent.min.js
scripts.test: npm run bundle && eslint index.js src/**/*.js test/**/*.js && jasmine JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=test/support/jasmine.json
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm run bundle && npm publish && semantic-release post
